page.title: 08PRIVATE SCHOOL,SUTTON VENY
page.content: Barton House is a large,old house that is used to be like an old manor house but has now been changed into a private school.There are only about ten children at the school and they are all girls who are 16 to 19 years old. The school is a boarding school and it teaches the girls cooking and needlework as well as reading and writing.The girls and usually ones who have not done very well at other schools and who do not want to learn for examinations.They stay at the school for about two years and then many of them go on to finishing schools. The school grows a lot of its own vegetables and keeps its own calves.
